column2:
"Oh, <%me>!
We have been waiting for you!
Now then... surprise!"
"Look at the size of this bird. More than enough for Christmas, would you not say? I would be honored if you would join us to eat it."
"...Hehe, I can understand your alarm. In truth, I too suffered a moment of fear when Franca presented it to me."
"...Hehe, I can understand your alarm. In truth, I too suffered a moment of fear when Franca presented it to me."

"A specially prepared Omega Cockatrice Roast!
...Does the size of it concern you? Worry not, you only need eat as much as you can manage."

"A specially prepared Omega Cockatrice Roast!
...Does the size of it concern you? Worry not, you only need eat as much as you can manage."
"The meat has been stuffed with all manner of delicious vegetables, so it shall make a fine feast for the three of us!"
